name: Strange Space Station
description:
On a stange and far-off planet, only known by its codename XTR8383, there's a research insitution dedicated to studying the strange flora and inhabitants of this mud planet.

indeed, the discoveries made here could change what we believe to know about biology and life outside of earth...

sounds super-boring! Let's shoot the place up instead!

Find more games on https://www.adventurebox.com/player
